title: How to write words in different font styles - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not totally sure I understand what you mean by your question. But it’s simple writing in different fonts. You spend a year or two practicing calligraphy or hand lettering or sign writing - and when you’ve mastered the skill you write one word in one font, and the next word in a different font. Repeat this until you have finished what you wanted to write or you’ve run out of fonts.
